Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piar,/aggeloc e#y#u#: Couri/l picalpict/c: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O holy archangel, Suriel the trumpeter, that He may forgive us our sins.
